General.Name: Western Regions Tourism Development
General.Description: Western Regions Tourism Development Co.,Ltd develops and operates tourism services in China. The company offers tourism transportation, lake yacht sightseeing, tourism resource development, cableway, sightseeing car, hot spring tourism, international travel agency, and catering services, as well as food, agricultural, and sideline product sales. The company was formerly known as Xinjiang Tianshan Tianchi Tourism Co., Ltd. Western Regions Tourism Development Co.,Ltd was founded in 2001 and is based in Fukang, China.
